title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type does not have any effect
description: When using the dynamic text content type, the expected behavior is not observed and the content type does not have any effect.
OB: When using the dynamic text content type, the expected behavior is not observed and the content type does not have any effect.
EB: When using the dynamic text content type, the expected behavior should be that the content type has the intended effect.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Go to [specific location]
2. Select the dynamic text content type
3. Perform the actions or operations that should be affected by the content type
4. Observe that the content type does not have any effect
